channel.title: Help running my client
channel.description:
Hi, i ran across a client and server of a server called epicurus that i played a while ago and loved it, i thought i might make one so that my friends and i can play together on, but ive encountered a few problems, when i add the server folder to eclipse it seems to work but when i add the client aswell i get an error
any help on how to run this and get it to work please :)
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,625602.0.html
